title: All 32 - Jacksonville Jaguars: Is Gardner Minshew in team's long-term plans plus Fournette/Ngakoue on the way out? with Hays Carlyon (Football 6/16)
description:
As we continue to cover 'All 32' teams in the NFL, some outlooks seem extremely bright, while others appear rather bleak. The Jaguars fit into that second category with the lowest win total in all of football. Guest Hays Carlyon, who covers the team for 1010 XL, joins guest host Sean Wagner-McGough to discuss why Jacksonville might struggle in 2020. They break down the future at quarterback and how Gardner Minshew fits into the team's long-term plans (2:00). Is this Leonard Fournette's last season with the Jags (8:30)? Has Yannick Ngakoue already played his last game for the organization (11:30) Hays addresses their futures as well.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @HaysCarlyon
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7ZUfHFsuQcW7BkTHnXJtqw?view_as=subscriber
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
